short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for guided breathing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to help users take a small break from their stressful lives and do a few cycles of guided breathing. Taking a moment to de-stress can provide much needed relaxation and clarity!
